Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Authorizes the Good Samaritan Hospital Medical Center to file an application for a real property tax exemption
Summary: Authorizes the Good Samaritan Hospital Medical Center to file an application for a real property tax exemption.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the Good Samaritan Hospital Medical Center to file an application for a real property tax exemption
